item.title: POST Data to Load Test with ApacheBench
item.author: codecraig@gmail.com (Craig Wickesser)
item.description: ApacheBench (also known as, ab) is, a tool for benchmarking your Apache Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) server Don’t be fooled, you can use it to benchmark any server that supports HTTP. In fact, it might be worth checking out boom which is written in Go which makes it easier to use across platforms, and is simple to install (spoiler alert: it’s just a binary). Anyhow, in this post I’ll demonstrate using ApacheBench (since I came across it first).
